channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Jiaxcuit

item.title: My Tips & Experience with IB Textbooks: Physics HL
item.description: Introduction This is the first post in my blog series called “My Tips & Experience with IB Textbooks”. The IB subjects covered in this series are DP Physics, Math AA, Chemistry, History, and Chinese A Lit. The corresponding levels and syllabus versions (year of first assessment) are as follows: Subject Level First Assessment Other Posts in this Series Physics HL 2016 This article Math AA HL 2021 To be updated Chemistry SL 2016 To be updated History SL 2017 To be updated Chinese A Lit SL 2021 To be updated All of these are the IB DP subjects that I’ve studied.

item.title: Assumptions for an Ideal Transformer
item.description: Transformers are closely related to induction in the study of electricity and magnetism. Here, I share an article1: Weekly Three Questions - Grade 12: (170) What is “ideal” for an ideal transformer? (【每周三题】高三【170】理想变压器都“理想”了什么？), by Wu Aixiong (吴爱兄). This article has largely deepened my understanding of transformers. This article is from Physics Learning Research (物理学习研究), a WeChat Official Account. It posts many other similar articles on physics that investigate into individual topics, including example problems, explanations, and exercises to consolidate knowledge.
